tasks.task_description: Initialize git repository and add pico-sdk as submodule
Create CMakeLists.txt with project configuration and dependencies
Implement I2C slave driver with register map (0x00-0x02: ID/version/config, 0x03: clock stretch, 0x10-0x12: buffer status, 0x20+: data)
Implement circular buffers (256B TX, 1024B RX) with drop-oldest policy
Implement USB-CDC device for console I/O
Implement flash persistence for I2C address configuration
Implement LCD driver for 1.14" 240x135 IPS display (SPI on GPIO8-12,25)
Create LCD UI with dark theme showing I2Console branding, I2C address, buffer levels, throughput stats, USB status, error counters
Implement watchdog timer and error handling
Implement USB firmware update support (picotool compatible)
Create README.md with documentation and usage instructions
Build firmware and fix compilation errors
Commit all files and push to GitHub metaneutrons/I2Console

description: Create I2Console enterprise-grade firmware for RP2350-GEEK with I2C slave, USB-CDC, and LCD display
context: Git repository initialized and pico-sdk added as submodule with all dependencies
Created CMakeLists.txt with RP2350 ARM configuration and all required dependencies
Implemented circular buffer with drop-oldest policy
Implemented flash persistence for I2C address and clock stretch configuration
Implemented USB-CDC device with TinyUSB descriptors
Implemented I2C slave driver with complete register map and interrupt handler
Implemented LCD driver for ST7789 1.14\" 240x135 display with SPI
Created LCD UI with dark theme displaying all required information
Implemented main application with watchdog timer and USB firmware update support
Successfully built firmware with no errors - I2Console.uf2 created
Successfully committed and pushed to GitHub metaneutrons/I2Console
